name: Virtuacall
overview: Videophones are invented. Now there are new opportunities to get to know pretty girls. While trying to pick up girls, a guy got given an ad for a new video phone service. At home, he calls the number, meeting the virtual girl whom connects him to girls. He talk with and get to know the girls on phone, then date them. If he is successful with the 10 or so girls, he might get a surprise and find out what virtual is.
